text: Kaltanėnai () is a town in Švenčionys district municipality, Vilnius County, east Lithuania. According to the Lithuanian census of 2011, the town has a population of 204 people. The town has a Catholic church. ==History== In July 1941, an Einsatzgruppen of Lithuanian collaborators murdered the local Jewish population in several mass executions.http://www.holocaustatlas.lt/EN/#a_atlas/search//page/1/item/192/http://www.holocaustatlas.lt/EN/#a_atlas/search//page/1/item/85/http://www.holocaustatlas.lt/EN/#a_atlas/search//page/1/item/108/ ==References== Category:Towns in Vilnius County Category:Towns in Lithuania Category:Holocaust locations in Lithuania
title: Kaltanėnai
